name: Sniper Shooter 3d - HD 3D Shooting
description: This game is a reality like experience of sniper shoot fight as a military commando army Sniper shooter 3d - hd Shooting on a special ops mission in the heat of war action. Your primary objective in this special ops mission is to kill all the deadly criminals which won’t be easy as they are also equipped with modern weapons, gun & sniper shooters. But that shouldn’t be a problem for you as you are an elite military commando sniper & army shooter with all the required stealth
